basic_information.scholarship_name: Carlos and Kristi Evans Endowed Scholarship Fund

description: The Carlos P. Evans Endowed Scholarship Fund is open to declared Finance majors. Students must submit a personal statement (minimum 400 words) describing academic and career goals. Must have completed 15 hours at time of application. Minimum 3.0 cumulative GPA. Must be U.S. citizen and Oklahoma resident. Financial need to be considered. Eligibility Requirements Declared Finance majors Completed 15+ hours Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.0 or higher US Citizen Oklahoma resident Students must submit personal statement (minimum 400 words) describing academic and career goals Selection Process Financial need to be considered
